name: Cloud Chaos (Hellolife2750)
description:
Welcome to the world of Cloud Chaos !  You play as un cloud and you're baby got surrounded by a wave of evil monsters. Your courage and perseverance will be the key to save your baby.

The more monsters you kill, the more resistant they are. That's why you have to develop your own strategy to kill them all. The monsters loot a lot of crazy stuff. Maybe you can make a collection or use it to be more strong. The rain, the snow or the storm: what personality trait suits you best ?

Good luck !!

⚠ Warning ⚠

When you want to install the app, it's possible that Google Play Protect warn you that this app is maybe dangerous because it doesn't reconize the developer. Go ahead and click on "install anyway".

If another warning tell you "impossible to install the application", just restart the installation and it should work.
